location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Commodore Richard Ethersey, Commander of the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf, aboard the HC Corvette Falklandin the Bushire Roads, to Commander James Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter advises that the Acting Resident's proposal to hire a native boat to convey a packet to Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] — for transmission to Bombay — may not be the speediest means of transmitting it to India. Instead the Commodore advises awaiting the arrival of the steamer Semiramisat Bushire.
